Notes:
Case File: #037.s Sarah Shevon
Trainer's Notes: A very sexy young lady, eager to perform. She lasted about 15 minutes before debilitating crying caused us to call the shoot. Possibly this is from hormonal swing and /or diet. She was cognitively present and responding rationally, but unable to control the emotional surges she was experiencing. Never saw anything like this, to this degree.
Recommend we try her again.
title: Slave Hunting
